body:
i’m thankful for this post by sarah hagi about going to a garfield-themed restaurant which contains a paragraph that made me laugh more than any paragraph in recent memory: 

[https://www.foodandwine.com/travel/garfield-eats-toronto-restaurant](https://www.foodandwine.com/travel/garfield-eats-toronto-restaurant)
